text:
[Verse]
Raindrops falling down on me
Dancing wild and feeling free
Splashing puddles one two three
This is where I wanna be

[Verse 2]
Clouds above they don't bring fear
Every drop just draws me near
Laughing loud for all to hear
In the rain my mind is clear

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain oh yeah
Twist and shout without a care
Feel the rhythm everywhere
Let the rain be our affair

[Verse 3]
Barefoot on the wet cool ground
Spinning round and round and round
Raindrops create a lovely sound
In this moment I am found

[Bridge]
Sky is grey but heart is light
In the rain it feels so right
Every drop a pure delight
Dance with me into the night

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain oh yeah
Twist and shout without a care
Feel the rhythm everywhere
Let the rain be our affair
title: Dancing in the Rain
